1099418856211152896.text: 7/ Decentralized reputation helps remove trusted intermediaries from the value stack (which is really important!), but doesn’t solve this fundamental issue.

1099418854990594048.text: 6/ The challenge upstream of a true unsecured lending market for crypto currencies is making it easier for *normal consumers* to use crypto in their day-to-day lives.

1099418853363265536.text: 5/ At the end of the day, the core issue at hand is that *it’s really hard to use crypto currencies to do the things unsecured borrowers want to do — namely, paying bills, buying food, building businesses, etc.*

1099418851861704704.text: 4/ Originating borrow is (loosely speaking) about finding *a lot* more good borrowers than bad borrowers.  Today, there are way more malicious reasons to borrow crypto than honest reasons.
